metadata.title: USN-7038-1 -- APR vulnerability
metadata.description: Thomas Stangner discovered a permission vulnerability in the Apache  Portable Runtime (APR) library. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to read named shared memory segments, potentially exposing sensitive application data.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7038-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapr1-dev - 1.7.2-3.1ubuntu0.1 libapr1t64 - 1.7.2-3.1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
